language.LanguageApp.name: LanguageApp
language.LanguageApp.doc: LanguageApp The Language service provides scripts a way to compute automatic translations of text. // The code below will write "Esta es una prueba" to the log. var spanish = LanguageApp.translate('This is a test', 'en', 'es'); Logger.log(spanish);

method.name: translate
method.doc: Automatically translates some text from a source language to a destination language.

argument.name: sourceLanguage
argument.doc: the language code in which text is written. If it is set to the empty string, the source language code will be auto-detected

argument.name: targetLanguage
argument.doc: the language code to which the text should be translated

method.name: translate
method.doc: Automatically translates some text from a source language to a destination language.

argument.name: sourceLanguage
argument.doc: the language code in which text is written. If it is set to the empty string, the source language code will be auto-detected

argument.name: targetLanguage
argument.doc: the language code to which the text should be translated
